description: System-generated surrogate key uniquely identifying this state record.
Official two-character USPS code for the U.S. state or district.
Full display name of the state or district corresponding to the code.
Optional free-text notes about this state entry for internal use.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this row.
Timestamp of the last modification attributed to a user; despite the name, field stores a date/time, not a user identifier (confirm with SME).
Identifier of the user or process that created this record; likely a user ID from the authentication system (confirm with SME).
Timestamp when this record was initially created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified this record; likely references a user table (confirm with SME).
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change to this record; may duplicate the system update timestamp (confirm with SME).
